author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE CONTINUING WESTWARD AWAY FROM THE MAIN HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
summary:
...HONE CONTINUING WESTWARD AWAY FROM THE MAIN HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
 As of 5:00 AM HST Mon Aug 26
 the center of Hone was located near 19.4, -161.0
 with movement W at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 998 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
